text:
362 Density Estimation with Gaussian Mixture Models
Figure 11.9
Illustration of the
EM algorithm for
ﬁtting a Gaussian
mixture model with
three components to
a two-dimensional
dataset. (a) Dataset;
(b) negative
log-likelihood
(lower is better) as
a function of the EM
iterations. The red
dots indicate the
iterations for which
the mixture
components of the
corresponding GMM
ﬁts are shown in (c)
through (f). The
yellow discs indicate
the means of the
Gaussian mixture
components.
Figure 11.10(a)
